content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IT procurement is the series of activities and procedures necessary to acquire information technology (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://searchdatacenter.techtarget.com/definition/IT\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"IT\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") products and services.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM – Global IT Procurement group is responsible for purchasing all hardware for EPAMers (both standard and non-standard, provided at IT and project cost).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more about responsibilities of EPAM – Global IT Procurement assignment group in article “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/Assignments%20to%20EPAM%20-%20Global%20IT%20Procurement.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assignments to EPAM - Global IT Procurement\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
